videos.title: Ridin' the Berryman Trail with an Old Friend and Some New Ones!!
videos.description:
Jasen met up with his buddy Ryan at the Berryman Trail on Halloween morning.  They hit some of the sweetest Ozark single track in Missouri on a beautiful fall day and made some new friends including one of the coolest trail dogs ever!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/search/top?q...
Follow us on Instagram: @bltbiking


Camera gear:
Canon 80D

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01BUYK04A/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B01BUYK04A&linkCode=as2&tag=bltbiking-20&linkId=ff10bbf90d3e65475c39de1e1d1badd1

Nikon Z6

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07GPRSYG8/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B07GPRSYG8&linkCode=as2&tag=bltbiking-20&linkId=a0fe00e64a729dde1ab25567849e1847

Canon 18-135mm
Tamron 45mm f/1.8
Tamron 70-210 f/4
Tokina 16-35mm f/2.8
GoPro Session, 5, and 8

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08C7FBW4N/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B08C7FBW4N&linkCode=as2&tag=bltbiking-20&linkId=ac5fdd5057588c4771031c153a768e61

DJI Mavic Air 2

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B086XCGMN7/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B086XCGMN7&linkCode=as2&tag=bltbiking-20&linkId=74bbfd741d7b45aaa653a00406caf543

videos.title: Berryman Bikepacking Trip 2016
videos.description: Great single-track and good times at the Mo Roots festival.

videos.title: 50 Mile Trail Run Prep - Journey to the Berryman - January  #running #ultra #trail
videos.description:
50 mile race preparation towards the Berryman Trail in Potosi, Missouri on 5/20/2023.

Join me in this journey as I challenge myself to push the limit.

#ospreypacks #merrell #running #ultramarathon  #garmin #iowa #memories #memorial #dji #trailrunning #nature #training #sounds #outdoors #snow #asmr #race #suicideprevention
